title: Drawing, "Study after a Funeral Monument and Study after Frieze", early 19th century
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli, Rome; Mr. and Mrs. Brandegee, Boston.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Study of funeral monument with personification of poetry, urn and dog; frieze of base of funeral monument; study of funeral monument with female figure and dog.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study after a Funeral Monument and Study after Frieze", early 19th century.
early 19th century. Graphite on gray-green wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3043.
